metadata.title: CVE-2024-25980 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Separate Groups mode restrictions were not honored in the H5P attemptsreport, which would display users from other groups. By default this onlyprovided additional access to non-editing teachers.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
